verses.roman:
loka kahe,--rātrye kaivartya naukāte caḍiyā
kālīya-dahe matsya māre, deuṭī jvāliyā

synonyms: loka kahe—the sensible respectable persons said; rātrye—at night; kaivartya—a fisherman; naukāte—on a boat; caḍiyā—getting up; kālīya-dahe—in the lake of Kālīya; matsya māre—catches fish; deuṭī jvāliyā—lighting a torch.
translation: These respectable gentlemen replied, "At night in the Kālīya Lake a fisherman lighting a torch in his boat catches many fish.
